name: part_004
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】3rd Anniversary LIVE Shine more!!! 【#さくらみこ３周年LIVE】 [cBQ2UD4LusU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Sakura Miko, Oozora Subaru, and Inugami Korone. They do a collaborative pose and exchange words of encouragement before the guests depart.

A surprise 'Emergency Mission' quest appears on screen. Subaru and Korone reveal a special surprise for Miko: autographs from the GTA development team. Miko reacts with overwhelming joy and gratitude before the guests depart again.

subtitles.original: いいよ！
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: やれやれ！
subtitles.english: Go for it!

subtitles.original: その中にみこみこみこ...
subtitles.english: And in the middle, Miko-Miko-Miko...

subtitles.original: 前前！
subtitles.english: Front! Front!

subtitles.original: 後ろ後ろ！
subtitles.english: Back! Back!

subtitles.original: いくぞ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: あ、なんかサンドの気持ちになる。いい感じじゃん。やだーありがとう！
subtitles.english: Ah, I feel like the filling of a sandwich. This feels nice. No way, thank you!

subtitles.original: え、かわいい！めっちゃかわいい！
subtitles.english: Eh, cute! So cute!

subtitles.original: えー、二人とも本当に来てくれてありがとうね。こちらこそありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Both of you, thank you so much for coming. The pleasure was all ours.

subtitles.original: じゃあみこ、このあとも頑張るんだよ。
subtitles.english: Well Miko, keep working hard for the rest of the show.

subtitles.original: 頑張ってね！お水飲んでね。しっかり頑張ってね。頑張ります！
subtitles.english: Good luck! Drink some water. Do your best! I will!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！ということで、みことお友、みこずまでした！
subtitles.english: Thank you! And so, we were Miko and Friends, Mikozuma!

subtitles.original: 緊急ミッション サプライズをしろ
subtitles.english: Emergency Mission: Pull off a surprise

subtitles.original: えっ！？クエスト！？なんかクエストが発生している！
subtitles.english: Eh!? A quest!? Some kind of quest has been triggered!

subtitles.original: 何だ？何が起こった？何が起こった？
subtitles.english: What is it? What happened? What happened?

subtitles.original: これはヤバい気配がします！クエスト、クエストじゃん！
subtitles.english: I'm getting a bad feeling about this! It's a quest!

subtitles.original: み、みこっち、クエストだって！
subtitles.english: M-Miko-chi, it's a quest!

subtitles.original: 何これ！何だこれ！何これ！？いいですか？ちょっと開けても。
subtitles.english: What is this? What on earth? What is it!? Can I open it?

subtitles.original: リハーサルでも何も言わなかったじゃない！
subtitles.english: You didn't say anything about this in rehearsal!

subtitles.original: じゃーん！すごい！本物じゃんこれ！ちょっと説明してもらっていいですか？
subtitles.english: Ta-da! Wow! This is the real deal! Can you explain what's going on?

subtitles.original: みこピーの皆さんがですね、みこっちのために...
subtitles.english: The Miko-p's got this for you, Miko-chi...

subtitles.original: えー、このね、ゲームの... GTAのですね、開発者さんのサインをもらってきてもらったんです！
subtitles.english: They managed to get autographs from the GTA developers!

subtitles.original: えー！ヤバい！うそでしょ！？すごーい！みんな見て後ろの写真！
subtitles.english: Eh! No way! Are you serious!? Amazing! Everyone, look at the photos behind us!

subtitles.original: えー！ヤバい！うそー！センキュー！センキュー！I love you GTA!
subtitles.english: Eh! No way! No way! Thank you! Thank you! I love you GTA!

subtitles.original: 本当だー！ヤバい！本物だこれ！こっちもいっぱいあるよ。
subtitles.english: It's true! Wow! These are real! There's a lot over here too.

subtitles.original: えー！そんなの持ってきていいの？ほら三つある、三つ！
subtitles.english: Eh! Is it okay to bring all these? Look, there are three of them!

subtitles.original: すごい！ヤバいじゃんこれ！みこっち今の気持ちをカメラにどうぞ。
subtitles.english: Amazing! This is incredible! Miko-chi, tell the camera how you feel.

subtitles.original: GTA I love you! 本当にありがとう！おめでとうおめでとう！
subtitles.english: GTA I love you! Thank you so much! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: あれ？知らなかったよね、みこみこは。
subtitles.english: Wait, you really didn't know, did you?

subtitles.original: マジで知らなかった。ガチびびった！ガチでびびった！
subtitles.english: I really had no idea. I'm literally shaking! Literally!

subtitles.original: 大事にね！大事に。でもね、みこみこほら、まだ歌があるからさ。
subtitles.english: Keep them safe! But Miko, you still have more songs to sing.

subtitles.original: 一旦これ回収させてもらって。ヤダー！ダメ、みこみこ。集中して。
subtitles.english: We'll take these for now. No way! Yes, Miko, you need to focus.

subtitles.original: 店長に預けて... ヤバい！
subtitles.english: Leave them with the manager... This is crazy!

subtitles.original: じゃあみこっち頑張ってね！頑張るんだよ！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Alright Miko-chi, good luck! You can do it! Thank you!

subtitles.original: えー、マジで。はぁー... びっくりしたんですけど。
subtitles.english: Seriously. Haa... I was so surprised.

subtitles.original: ということでね、このあとも頑張っていきたいと思いまーす。センキュー！
subtitles.english: So, I'm going to keep doing my best. Thank you!

subtitles.original: えっ、ちょっとヤバい。動悸がヤバい。
subtitles.english: Wait, this is bad. My heart is racing.

subtitles.original: adrenaline!!! 作詞・作曲：中野領太 (onetrap)
subtitles.english: adrenaline!!! Lyrics & Composition: Ryota Nakano (onetrap)

subtitles.original: 単純な言葉　重ねてゆく
subtitles.english: Stacking up simple words

subtitles.original: もっと心は素直で
subtitles.english: The heart should be more honest

subtitles.original: なんでもないような　その笑顔が
subtitles.english: That seemingly ordinary smile

subtitles.original: 明日を照らす光に
subtitles.english: Will become the light that lights up tomorrow

subtitles.original: ずっと気づいていたんだって
subtitles.english: I've always noticed it

subtitles.original: この手に抱えていたんだって
subtitles.english: I've been holding it in my hands

subtitles.original: 弾けた声に
subtitles.english: In that bursting voice

subtitles.original: 零した答えが今
subtitles.english: The answer I let slip is now

subtitles.original: 今　そっと　きっと　願いこめた
subtitles.english: Now, surely and gently, filled with a wish

subtitles.original: ずっとまわる　まわる　夢の中で
subtitles.english: Spinning, spinning in a dream forever

subtitles.original: 繰り返し　君と踊った
subtitles.english: Over and over, I danced with you

subtitles.original: 揺れる景色　道は続く
subtitles.english: Swaying scenery, the road continues

subtitles.original: 通り過ぎる　風に吹かれ
subtitles.english: Blown by the passing wind

subtitles.original: 何度も越えて行けるから　境界線
subtitles.english: I can cross the boundary line again and again

subtitles.original: 今　かき分けて　手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: Now, pushing through, I reached out my hand

subtitles.original: 涙は今　浮かぶ空に預けて
subtitles.english: I'll leave my tears in the floating sky

subtitles.original: 走り出すの
subtitles.english: And start running
